game.name: Train Simulator: Suburban Glasgow: Airdrie Route Extension Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Embark on more journeys through the densely packed railways of Suburban Glasgow with a new extension to Airdrie, the classic terminus of the North Clyde Line, in this new expansion for Train Simulator Classic.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Embark on more journeys through the densely packed railways of Suburban Glasgow with a new extension to Airdrie, the classic terminus of the North Clyde Line, in this new expansion for Train Simulator Classic.
